article_title: Medicaid expansion is a good deal
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Over two and half years ago, the expansion of the Medicaid program in Ohio was approved by the Ohio Controlling Board because there wasn’t enough support to get it passed in the legislature. Fast forward to today, and there are solid economic reasons why Ohio's Medicaid program might be good for Ohio businesses.
